text: Is there an API endpoint that will return age and rotation status of a private app key?
Hi Justin. I am putting the Brevo key.

Hi, Trying to set hs_next_activity_date for a lead using API but it returns error like you can't set calculated property.
Any solution ?

Hello, We would like to send automations from HubSpot based on certain products. However, we lack information about which tags we can use for this via the API. Example: someone buys a certain product category from us and should then receive an e-mail for it. Does anyone have any clues to this? Thanks so much in advance.

Hey <@U075XN6BYLV>
If im understanding correctly, you need to send an email when someone buys a product withing a certain category.

Because the API is not necessarily Event Driven, workflows would probably be a better choice. Using enrollment criteria you can target exactly this!

Now if you dont have accesses workflows you've got 2 options:
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks|webhooks>
    ◦ this will fire a post request to an established webhook endpoint, From there you can use the API to get the category property from the object sent to the webhook and fire the email needed
• polling
    ◦ you can also poll the deal's API checking for closed won deals that represent the sale

See the Objects section to get deals on how to use each objects API
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/developer-guides-resources>

Hey <@U073PAMD6F3>

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/properties/HubSpots-default-contact-properties#:~:text=Next%20activity%20date%3A%20the%20date,be%20completed%20in%20the%20future.|hs_next_activity_date> is a calculated field that is based on scheduled engagement activity.
To set this dynamically you can create a future engagement. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/meetings|Meetings API for reference>

Hi everyone, new here. I'm pretty sure the answer is no but figured why not ask. Is there a way to transfer Private App ownership to another user? The person who created the Private App in HubSpot is leaving the company an I'm wondering if I can transfer it vs recreating it (HubSpot's Private App scope seems tied to its creators permissions). Thanks in advance!
A private app is created in the portal and is not owned by a developer account.  A developer app on the other hand is owned by the developer.  So is your app a private app or a developer app?
